item.title: Data Security
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Data Security ChatGPT answer: How can data be secured to prevent unauthorized access and theft? What are the most common cyber threats to data security, and how can they be mitigated? What measures can organizations take to ensure data security compliance with legal and industry regulations? What is the impact of data breaches on businesses, and how can they recover from such incidents?

item.title: System Security
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about System Security ChatGPT answer: What measures are used to protect against unauthorized access to a computer system? How are passwords managed and secured to prevent breaches? What steps are taken to prevent malware and viruses from infecting a computer network? How are sensitive data and information protected from insider threats or theft? What is the procedure for responding to a security breach or attack, and how is the system repaired and strengthened following such an incident?
